entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Saturday 04 March 2023
